choices: On the way to the Black tie affair...
1.content:
Harvey Bolt was at work, late one thursday night. He was really looking forward to later as Susanne had received two tickets to the black tie gala held by a local business tycoon, Mrs. Ileana Corrice. This would be an excellent chance for Harvey to get his name in with many of the town's top businessmen and politicians as well as be an excellent opportunity to suggest to Susanne that they get an apartment together and finally move out of their parent's houses. Since his mind was elsewhere, Harvey wasn't paying attention to the exact frequencies and amplitudes he was inputting for the fancy new laser he was working with.

“Harvey! Can you come help me move this workbench?” called out Dr. Phillip Hopscotch, Harvey's boss from across the lab.

“Sure thing”, replied Harvey, jumping to his feet and walking across the test firing area.

As he stepped in front of the laser, he felt a slight tingle and all his body hair stood on end. The laser then overloaded and the computer Harvey had been working at exploded.

“Holy shit!” shouted out Dr. Hopscotch, running over to Harvey, “You okay?”

“Yeah, I'm fine,” replied Harvey, “But the laser is ruined!”

Dr. Hopscotch looked over at the smouldering mess of Harvey's workstation and the laser and shook his head.

“Well the important thing is that no one was hurt,” commented Dr. Hopscotch.

Harvey then helped Dr. Hopscotch try and rescue what was left of the laser before heading off to change for his evening with Susanne.

Little did Harvey know that within his body a strange power was building up that would allow him to swap gender (name too), age, work & school, relationships (family & friends, etc.), or hobbies (any permutation thereof) with someone else by shooting them with a beam of light no more than once a week. The question is, when did Harvey's (your) power first activate?
1.title: An Accident at work

choices: A stressed out, female first-year student whose family lives half a country away
A calm, middle aged university professor with a hard working doctor as a husband
A female middleschool student who has snuck out for a night on the town
A young single mother graduate student from the faculty of medicine

11133.title: Work/school and...

113.content: What do you swap with the girl?
113.title: A female middleschool student who has snuck out...

11313.content:
As you are heading from your car to get Susanne you see a teen-aged girl dressed to go into a club. You sigh, "Like she'll ever get in looking like that," and then there is a brief blast of light as you fire a changing beam at the girl, forcing you to blink.

When everything clears you look around for the girl, where she had been there's now a college age man out on the prowl. Then the wind picks up and you feel a chill on your bare legs and quickly realize that you're wearing a pink mini-dress. You quickly grab your skirts and stop everyone from getting a free view and then you start trying to understand how exactly you came to be wearing a dress. As you start to think the you might have swapped with the girl, who then would have turned into the man, Susanne appears at your side.

"Harriet, are you ok, it's not safe for a girl your age to be alone on the street like this," Susanne says, not that you care because she is dressed to kill, tight black satin mini-dress, her hair done up nicely and the girls are on display. Fortunately your transformation has left you about face level with her cleavage which makes this much less awkward. "But that's a real pretty dress you have Harriet, come on up to my apartment I'll do your make up before I drive us off to the event."

'Well,' you think, 'She definitely thinks I'm a girl and now that I'm walking I can tell Susanne isn't the only one of us in heels tonight... which goes along with that theory. I can either just let this play out and act the shy little girl or throw a fit about my lost masculinity.'

"What a weird day," you mumble as she leads you towards her apartment.
11313.title: Gender and Age

choices: askbody ask susanne to hurry up
113131.content: it occurs to you that if you do try to say you are actually a college age man who works at the university, people will think you're just a loony little girl. it's probably easier to stay calm and go with the flow as opposed to freaking everyone out. it's very uncomfortable for you to walk, so you examine your premature body for ways to make travel easier. on your way to susannes apartment you see that there is a hello kitty purse strung around your shoulder, very cheap looking and trashy. "figures, being I must be around eleven or twelve years old now", you think out loud, an susanne asks you to repeat yourself. "what was that, darling?" "oh, nothing, just talking to myself" and the two of you resume walking. you come to the apartment and step inside. Susanne has a giant mirror, and you attempt to avoid looking at your new body. what do you do?
113131.title: play this out

1131311.content: you try not to, but you're very tempted to look. finally, you give in. "how very strange…" you say, as susanne goes upstairs. you are wearing the same clothes as the young girl from before, except now you have long black hair tied into two pigtails, nails painted a blue-ish green-ish color, fake eyelashes, and a tee shirt that read 'daddy's lil' angel'. your lips are thoroughly coated in a lovely peach color that would've looked lovely on a girl your age, and blue eyeshadow. you looked like a ten-cent hooker, based on your makeup! your face looked like that of Selena Gomez, almost hispanic looking. your legs were short, skinny and cleanly shaven, your feet sported high-heeled sandals, your pink mini skirt almost too short, and your toes had to be your least favorite part. they were each a different shade of pink, some magenta, some hot pink, and the big toe on your right foot was rainbow. your hands and feet looked very fragile and soft, like they hadn't done any manual labor in their existence. you smiled at your reflection and saw that where your perfect pearly whites used to be were yellow, brace clad teeth. just then, sussanne arrives. "you could go how you are now, or I'll make you look all nice and pretty for the party!"
1131311.title: look at your new body

1132.content:
In a bright flash, the young girl's attire changed dramatically. Gone was her cheap attire, replaced instead by a tasteful skirt and blouse. Her hair was now done in a tight bun and she carried a tasteful satchel. Her heeled feet clicked as she walked towards campus. Obviously headed to a night class or study group.

"Harvey? Hello, Earth to Harvey!" Susanne was calling to you. Snapping out of your daze you see her outstretched hand grasping for you, the other holding her building's door open. "come on honey, let's get ready for the party."

Holding your hand, you climb the flight of stairs to her apartment.

As Susanne gets ready, you inspect her apartment. Something is off. Her fridge is covered with finger paintings and drawings.

"How as your day honey? Learn anything new?" Susanne asks as she slides into a very revealing black dress that gets you slightly aroused.

"Work was ok, almost had an accident in the lab today." You reply.

"I love when you refer to school as 'work', so endearing and cute! You said there was a problem in science class? Did you mess up dissecting your frog?" She replies.

Now you're really confused. But suddenly it dawns on you, why the middle school girl suddenly changed outfits. You reach for your leather wallet hoping you're wrong about what has happened. When your hand grasps what should've been your wallet, your worst fears are realized. Your nice leather wallet has been replaced with a velcro nylon wallet emblazoned with the local pro-football team's logo.

Ripping the velcro seal, you frantically pull out what looks like an ID, only to discover a student ID has replaced your driver's license. Digging further into your "new" wallet, you find only random pictures of you and Susanne goofing off at the beach, a library card stating that you are now in the 7th grade, and a punch card for what the Juice Stand known to be a kid's hangout.

"Oh crap!" you mutter to yourself.

"HARVEY BOLT! You watch your language!" Susanne yells at you from the bathroom where she's applying the final touches to her make-up.

You head to the fridge and inspect the "artwork", just as you suspected, all done by you. Apparently Susanne has been dating you since around 4th grade, which would explain the progressing improvement of the work. You crack the door and grab a beer, popping the top and taking a large swig.

You see Susanne's face change from panic over being late to anger.

"Harvey! You're too young to drink! Give me that!" She says grabbing the bottle from your hand. "you know how much trouble we could get in! What has gotten into you this evening? Cursing and drinking? Are you going to tell me you have taken up smoking?"

"uh...I'm sorry" you half-heartedly reply. Apparently you really never had drank, the one swig you took hits you hard and you have a mild buzz going on.

"Well...I forgive you," Susanne tussles your hair. "Are you ready? Where's your bowtie?"

"M-my bowtie?" you ask.

"here, let me see your backpack." She says crossing the room. Pulling out a back pack covered in colorful writing/graffiti, she pulls out a clip-on bowtie. Before returning and affixing it to your shirt.

"There, all set, a perfect gentleman!" she says with a tone of satisfied triumph. "Now! Let's go!"

Susanne makes a move towards the door, heels clicking on the floor, grabbing her purse, phone, and opening the door.

As you both walk down the stairs the thought dawns on you that you no longer can drive, so Susanne will be your adult supervision for the evening.

"Did you check to make sure your bike is locked Harvey?" Susanne asks, unlocking her car in the process.

Glancing around, you see a BMX bike, complete with baseball cards in the spokes, with the name "BOLT" etched on the down-tube.

"yep, I'm good." you say. Distraught, you wonder how else this night could go worse.
1132.title: Work & School

114.content: Across the street is a woman, probably around late 20s or early 30s. She was dressed in a very elegant red dress that complimented her body perfectly. Her brunette hair was perfectly styled to the side. If you didn't know her (like Harvey) you would have never guessed she was a mother. Just as Susanne was about to ask him something, he felt a beam of life extend from him, and when it ended he found out that he had swapped ________ with the single mother.

1221.content: Do you swap Gender and/or Age with Mrs. Corrice, the wealthy hostess?

choices: Ask Suzanne why Mrs. Corrice thought you were hosting the party
The mayor comes over to speak with you
Someone else comes over to talk to you about business
1222.content:
"This certainly is a great party you're throwing," comments Susanne.

"I'm holding?" you wonder to yourself, Susanne normally didn't make that kind of mistake, always priding herself on getting the facts straight.

"Mr. Bolt?" Mrs. Corrice says to you nervously, "I'd just like to thank you for inviting me and my daughter to your event! As a University student I don't normally get to come to these sorts of things. So I just wanted to make sure to thank you."

"My event?" you ask her, wondering why the hostess was acting so strangely.

"Oh, sorry," apologized Mrs. Corrice, "I know you like to think of the event as being an event for the city but still, I'd like to thank you for the opporunity to be here!"

"Uh," you mutter back, wondering if this was all some bizarre prank of some sort.

"I'm sure Harvey appreciates your thanks Miss..." pipes up Susanne.

"Uh, Mrs. Ileana Corrice," helps Mrs. Corrice.

"I hope you enjoy your evening then Mrs. Corrice," smiles Suzanne shotly before Mrs. Corrice disappears with her daughter into the crowd.
1222.title: work & school

12223.content:
"Mr. Bolt?" a sharp voice says from behind you.

You turn to find yourself facing Mr. Elliston Gardstone one of Mrs. Corrice's (now your)business partners.

"Hello," you say uneasily, not knowing who this strange man is.

"I'll go mingle Harvey while you and Mr. Garstone talk business!" announces Suzanne, before wandering off.

"Uh," you reply, wondering what is going on.

"Very well then Mr. Bolt," begins the man before launching into a long winded question about the industry you (still unknowingly) were a leader in.

That industry was...
12223.title: Someone else comes over to talk to you about bu...

123.content: What did you swap with Mrs. Corrice's 11 year old daughter?

1231.content: Do you swap Gender and/or Age with Mrs. Corrice's 11 year old daughter?
1231.title: gender or Age

choices: reply that you are fine, just were disoriented for a moment.
12311.content:
You suddenly feel very different. Shaking it off as being nothing you look around only to notice that Mrs. Corrice now had a little boy standing at her feet instead of the little girl you had seen moments earlier. Susanne then grabs your elbow and directs your attention to the town mayor who is just arriving.

You then realize that just then Suzanne had touched your bare skin, which should not be possible considering the fancy suit you had put on earlier. Looking down at your arm in shock you are surprised to see the tanned, thin and bare arm of a woman where your arms should be. Looking straight down you are suddenly confronted by a full on view down the front of the body of a young woman dressed in a ankle length, scarlet sequinned dress with a matching veil draped over her shoulders. Peeking out from underneath the dress you saw a pair of scarlet heeled sandals to match the dress.

"What's wrong Magnolia?" asked Susanne.

"Who?" you ask her back, staring wide eyed into her eyes, wondering why she wasn't freaking out that her boyfriend had just turned into a strange woman.

"Mag? You feeling okay?" asked Suzanne, staring deeply into your eyes, her gaze still showing the loving compassion she always had shown you in the past.
12311.title: Gender only

choices: continue at the black tie event
1232.content:
There is a brief flash as the bolts fly from your eyes and hit Mrs. Corrice's daughter. You blink a couple of times and since no one else acknowledged the flash you presume it was a result of your accident.

"Are you alright, honey?" Susanne says putting a hand on your shoulder.

"It's just something bugging my eye because of my accident at work today," you say.

"Hehe, it's always so cute when you call school work honey," Susanne giggles.

"Oh, our Samantha does that too," Mrs. Corrice says pridefully.

"That's because I DO work at the university," Mrs. Corrice's daughter, Samantha, said irritably.

"You work at the university?" you say to Samantha.

"Yes," Samantha says perkily, "It helps pay my tuition."

You lower your brow and give her a cock-eyed look, "You are in university?"

"Yup. What level of schooling are you at?" Samantha says defensively.

"Level of schooling?" you say not quite getting what she's saying.

"Elementary," Susanne interjects in your defense, "but he's at the top of his grade 5 class. Middle school next fall." While part of you knows that isn't right another part of you knows that it's right.
1232.title: work & school

You gasp in your newly undeveloped voice. Your father looks at you and asks what's wrong. You say nothing and he says that it's time to go to school. You realise that you will have to attend school in this body. What do you do?

144.content:
Who did the beam hit outside?

Lily-Ann Tulip, a 17 year old highschool cheerleader who lives with her older sister (Paula) and volunteers as an actress at the community theatre in her free time.

Alexandra Stevenson, a 29 year old fiancee of the chief of police. She works as a ticket agent for the City's mass transit system and enjoys spending her time off hiking and canoeing.
144.title: Swap something with someone outside

1441.content:
Now the real question is, what did you swap with Lily-Ann Tulip?

(Her bio again: Lily-Ann Tulip, a 17 year old highschool cheerleader who lives with her older sister (Paula) and volunteers as an actress at the community theatre in her free time.)
1441.title: Lily-Ann Tulip

choices: A girl's sheer uniform (you are still considered a boy though)
14412.content:
Suddenly you found yourself sitting in a car as it made its way down your street.Looking over at the driver's seat you find a girl you don't know at the wheel.

"Hello?" you ask the girl, hoping she doesn't freak out at your sudden appearance next to her in her car.

"What's up Sis?" asks the girl, still focussing on her driving.

You wonder why she didn't seem freaked out that you had somehow teleported into the passenger seat of her car. She then pulls into a parking lot and park the car.

"Well, here we are!" she announces, looking over at you expectantly.

"Where is this?" you ask her, wondering why this girl you had never met was acting so calm about you being in her car.

"The highschool for the big game!" smiles back the girl, "How you managed to convince them to let a university student be on the cheer team I'll never figure out!"

"Who is on the cheer team?" you ask, trying to get a grasp on what is going on.

"You are of course! Heck you are their assistant team captain even. Now grab your stuff from the back and go get changed! I'll be back after the game to pick you up again!" retorts the girl, her answer confusing you even more. "Well, what are you waiting for Harvey? Let's go!" With that she grabbed a duffel bag from the back seat and tossed it at you. Taking the duffel bag you confusedly get out of the car and watch as the girl drives off.

As you stand there, thoroughly confused, you see an energetic teenaged girl run over to you from the other end of the parking lot. She is carrying a duffel bag that matches the one you were now holding. She comes right up to you just beaming and bubbling with excitement.

"Hey there Girlfriend!" she says, dropping her duffel bag and reaching out to hug you.

Unsure what to do, you return her hug.

"So Harv, you pumped about today?" she asks.

"What are you talking about?" you ask her, hoping for a better answer than the ones the girl in the car had given.

"What do you mean girl? Its the big game! The whole school will be there to see us do our routine!" she bubbles back, "Come on! lets go get changed!" With that she grabs your hand and picks up her duffel bag. You are then towed off to the school's change rooms.

Once outside the change rooms you are pushed into the boys change room and the girl goes into the girls change room telling you to not be too long in getting your uniform on. Inside the change room you go over to a bench and open the duffel bag only to see...
14412.title: relationships and hobbies

choices: not change into your new cheer-outfit
144121.content:
As you lift the short white tank top out of the duffel bag your jaw drops.

"They expect me to wear that?" you murmur. Turning the top around you see emblazoned across the back "Bolt" in big sparkly letters. Looking back into the duffel bag you also see a matching sheathed skirt, knee length socks, a pair of panties and a sports bra. Laying everything out you decide that this must all be a dream considering how strange everything has been so far. Feeling around your body you confirm that you are in fact still a guy and peeking in a mirror confirm that you still look like one too.

"What the hell is going on?" you mutter.Shrugging your shoulders you decide to...
144121.title: A girl's cheerleader's uniform

choices: Go back out into the hallway
look at your reflection before going outside
1441212.content: Thinking that since this must all be a dream you might as well go along with it, you undress. Once completely naked you see that your body was completely shaven. You then nervously put on the panties and sports bra, surprised to find that they fit you despite you male body. Next were the top and skirt followed by the knee length socks. Digging deeper into the bag you find a pair of shoes, some makeup and a small purse. Leaving the purse and makeup behind you put on the shoes, toss everything else in a locker and...
1441212.title: change into the cheer-outfit

choices: You trip and sprain your ankle
You are pulled aside by the bubbly girl again
14412122.content:
Looking at your reflection you find yourself to be a bit odd looking. It was like you'd decided to cross dress as a cheerleader without putting much effort into it, aside from getting custom made clothing to fit your male body-shape. Shrugging your shoulders you go out into the hallway where the energetic girl from before was now joined by a large group of teenaged cheerleaders.

"Hey Harvey!" one of the cheerleaders calls out, completely non-phased by your strange appearance.

You go over to the group and are immediately bombarded with a bunch of teenaged gossip.

"You know Harvey, Its really great that you were able to get onto the cheer team!" said the bubbly girl from before, "I don't know what I'd do if I never got a chance to spend some time with my BFF what with you going to university and everything!"

You found it so strange how everyone was treating you like you had always known them and were in fact great friends (which you know to not have been the case) while still getting some facts about your life so perfectly (such as your attending university).

Just then one of the girls calls for silence. "Well girls... Who is ready to go out there and cheer like we've never cheered before?" shouted the girl you you could see by her uniform was the team captain.

"We are!" screamed back the rest of the cheerleaders. They then all ran off, dragging you with them, to the football field outside.

As you approached the edge of the field...
14412122.title: reflection, then going back out

choices: The game starts. The cheerleaders aren't on until 1/2 time
144121222.content:
"Oh Harvey! Look!" whispers the bubbly girl pointing in the direction of the announcer's box, "There is Tom! I didn't know he was going to be announcing for today's game."

"Uh," you murmur back, wondering what she is getting at.

"You are so lucky to be dating him! He really is the nicest guy in the whole school. Its a wonder you ever found each other what with all the late work you do at that research lab! If only I could have a boyfriend like him," oozed the girl as though you knew what she was talking about. "And he's even coming to the opening night of that play you are in tonight. You really are a lucky boy Harvey! And I'm so lucky to have you as my girlfriend! Ain't that right my bestest BF in the entire world?"

After that she ran off to rejoin the other cheerleaders, leaving you more confused than ever.
144121222.title: You are pulled aside by the bubbly girl again

At the zoo with Suzanne as she is doing some research on saturday
15.title: Someplace Else

choices: The quiet little girl, the 21 year old woman or the flight attendant
the crying wife or the bitchy teen
151.content:
As you waited patiently for your bus to come, it was late again, you looked around at the other people also waiting for various other busses.

The first person you happen to spot was a little girl, no older than five who was sitting beside her overweight sleeping father. The girl was dressed in a plain white blouse and a pair of jeans. She was being very quiet and not moving much and maintained her sight fixated on a crack in the pavement directly in front of her.

Your watching of the quiet little girl was interrupted when a 21 year old woman walked between you and the girl. This woman was wearing a white T-shirt styled as though it had newsprint on it. Below that she sported a nice leather belt that was holding up (barely as you could just make out the strap of a thong over her ass) a pair of tight designer jeans followed by a pair of pointed, heeled knee high boots. The girl's straight, streaked brown and blond hair ran down to her shoulders and she sported a few bracelets and a fancy watch on her wrist. Over one shoulder you saw a small black purse while the other hand held an iphone that she was furiously texting on. As the woman took a seat farther down the platform you turned your attention to other passengers.

Looking over at the drop-off and pick-up zone you see a tired looking airplane stewardess waiting to be picked up. she had shoulder length dirty blonde hair and was still wearing her stewardess uniform. As a seat she was using her small flight bag. As she waited impatiently you could tell that she was fighting to stay awake.

The next person you took the time to look at was a 30-something woman who had just arrived and was crying heavily. She was wearing a nice looking business suit and was holding a ring in her hands. The ring seemed to be the focus of her anguish as she turned it over and over, weeping loudly. Her sell phone then rang and she answered it with a loud and anguished "I can't believe he cheated on me!" She then continued to tell her woes, rather loudly, to whoever it was that had called. From what you overheard before the call ended, she had just caught her husband cheating on her with an older woman in the back seat of her car.

The next person to attract your attention was a teenager having an argument with a bus driver. Based on the sound of things, the teenager was trying to get the driver to let her on without paying. The teenager was dressed in a bright pink spaghetti strap tank top and was wearing a pair of old and tattered looking jeans though by the shiny watch she was wearing and the designer bag she was carrying you doubted that she was at all strapped for cash.

After a short while you looked back at one of the above mentioned people and swapped something with one of them.
151.title: At a bus terminal

1511.content: Do you swap something with the quiet little girl, the 21 year old woman or the flight attendant?
1511.title: The  little girl, the 21 year old or stewardess

15111.content: What do you swap with the quiet little girl?
15111.title: quiet little girl

15112.content: What do you swap with the 21 year old who is texting on her iphone.
15112.title: 21 year old woman

choices: Get on the bus and go to University, figure this out later
skip the bus, you need to figure out what happened first
151121.content:
After a sudden and unexplained flash of light you found yourself looking at a plainly dressed guy who was playing some sort of game on his Android phone. Furrowing your brow you wondered what had happened to the trendy looking young woman.

"Excuse me miss, is this seat taken?" asks a kind looking elderly gentleman. You shake your head and he sits down. You then wonder why he'd just called you 'miss'

You look down and are shocked at the sight you saw. You were now dressed in a very similar outfit to what the other woman had been wearing. Not only that but you also appeared to have the body of a fit young woman too. Reaching up to your head you find that while it is barely any longer than it was before though after you look in one of the security mirrors you see that it is styled in a very nice looking feminine hairdo. Examining the security mirror a bit more you see that while you were now inexplicably a woman you were not the woman you had seen before. You were just dressed like someone who had her driving interest in fashion and looking good. Cross that, the woman you had turned into was someone who had a headstrong driving interest in looking fantastic at all times and the way you dressed clearly showed it.

"Huh," you say, using your new voice for the first time, "This is very strange."

Though you looked like a powerfully minded fashionista you still did not feel any different inside. You still felt like a regular guy who was interested more in science and video games than what colour of shirt to wear. The only real change was that you now were inhabiting the body of someone who, to the outside world, looks like a hip and hot young woman who is in with whatever the fad is that day.

As you ponder how you could have wound up in this strange new body, your bus arrives.
151121.title: gender and hobbies/interests

choices: Keep looking for a clear seat
1511211.content: You decide that you'd do better figuring this out at school so you go up to the bus. You then discover that the pockets of your jeans are empty and have to open the small purse you now had and retrieve your bus pass from within. You slowly walk onto the bus, uneasy in the heeled boots you were wearing. As you make your way to the back of the bus, yet to find a place to sit, a vaguely creepy looking highschool aged boy moves his bag off of the seat next to him and motions for you to sit down.
1511211.title: Get on the bus and go to University

choices: Susanne comes up and greets you (you are still dating her)
you go into a building to find a quiet place to think
15112111.content:
You mutter a thanks to the boy and sit down beside him. As the bus pulls away from the curb you notice that the boy is staring at your new, fully developed, female chest. You grimace at the thought of some other guy ogling you and search desperately for something else to look at. As you peruse the various ads on the bus you almost feel the hot stare of the boy beside you as he fixates on the assets you did not have just ten minutes earlier. Turning to look at him again you see that his pants have tented and you let out a disgusted sigh. Shaking your head you turn and look directly out the window on the other side of the bus. When The bus finally pulls into the university you look over at the boy one last time and spot a small wet spot at the peak of his tented crotch.

"Grow up!" you blurt out before quickly, and clumsily, storming off the bus. As the bus pulls away you shiver at what had just happened. Once the bus has turned the corner and is out of sight...
15112111.title: Sit down

choices: Go to class before you are late
Go to talk to Dr. Hopscotch first
151121111.content:
"Hey there sweet-pea!" exclaims a joyous Susanne, giving you a big hug and then passionately kissing you on the lips.

"Uh..." you gasp back in surprise and confusion.

"Of course I do silly! We've only been dating for two years haven't we?" replies Susanne.

"What about Harvey?" you ask, wondering how Susanne could mistake the trendy looking bombshell you were now for the average looking science nerd you used to be.

"Who the hell is Harvey?" asks Susanne, "There is no one else for me aside from you!"

"And I am?" you ask her.

"Why you are Harriet Genevieve Bolt, my dedicated and beautiful girlfriend of course!" she exclaims back.

"Okay then," you reply, still a bit confused.

"Well, I'll see you at lunch time my trendy little sugarplum!" says Susanne, giving you a tender peck on the cheek before rushing off to class.

With that you were left speechlessly watching her run off to class.
151121111.title: Susanne shows up

choices: accidentally bump into one of the other undergraduate students
1511211112.content:
As you enter the science lab you notice that it looks like there wasn't even any sort of accident the night before. In fact the computer you had sworn had blown up last night was still sitting there in perfect condition.

"Ah, hello there Miss Bolt!" greets a smiling Dr. Hopscotch, "I don't have you down for a shift this morning do I?"

"Ah, no," you reply, starting to realize that whatever happened to you must have mostly only affected your gender and apparently past fashion sense.

"Then what can I do for you?" asks Dr. Hopscotch.

"I wanted to ask you about what the effects of that laser I got hit with last night might be?" you asked.

"What do you mean last night? I sent you home early so you could get changed for your big night with young Miss Lockridge!" replied Dr. Hopscotch, perplexed, "And since I was working through till midnight I'm sure I'd have noticed if you had stopped by the lab or anything."

"Uh, sorry, my mistake," you say back to him.

"You must've just dreamed it then," replied your boss, "Anyways I guess you had better be off to class! Also you can have tonight off since I've got to be at the airport by 4PM if I'm going to make my flight to that conference in Guadalajara!"

As you head off to class you wonder what you are going to do now and how you'll be able to get back to your old body and life. As you walk you...
1511211112.title: Go to talk to Dr. Hopscotch first

choices: You make it to class without incident
Tim joins you as you make your way to class
15112111122.content:
Too caught up in your thoughts you walk right into someone who was waiting to get into one of the classrooms. Turning to look at the person you bumped into you see that it is a rather handsome looking guy. The guy then hands you your new purse and nods his head while you mutter out an embarrassed apology.

"Hi! The name's Mike!" greets the guy, thrusting forth a hand to shake yours with.

You weekly return his handshake. "Harv... Harriet," you reply shakily. As you swallow hard you feel a strange feeling in your groin. Realizing what your new female body was trying to tell you, you mutter, "Sorry, gotta go!" and run off, blushing brightly.
15112111122.title: Bumping into someone

choices: help him build the courage to ask Candy out
tell him to start paying attention to class
151121111222.content:
"Hey Harriet! Wait up!" shouts out Tim as you turn the corner to climb some stairs.

You pause for a second to let Tim catch up, wondering just how much the odd changes to your life and body had twisted your friendship with Tim. As the two of you climb the stairs on your way to your first class Tim engages you with small talk. While the topics of conversation were far less detailed and game focussed than usual you felt that for the most part your friendship with Tim was unchanged. As you arrive at the class and take a seat in the back row, having not had time to grab your books from the locker you rented from the student's union.

Soon the professor is off explaining something or other about Integrals. Though you usually tried to pay close attention in class you were far too curious to figure out more about the strangely different and yet similar life you now seemed to have.

"Hey, Harriet!" whispered Tim from beside you, "I think today I'm gonna go ask out Candy!"

You roll your eyes, glad that Tim's crush on Candy Bean, one of your classmates, was still unchanged.

"What? I really am!" exclaims Tim quietly, taking your eye roll as being your doubt in his resolve.

"If you are so into her what stopped you from asking her out every day this week," you query.

"Well man, I dunno," he replied, "I mean, look at her! There is no way a girl that pretty would ever want to spend time with me!"

You then look over at Candy and silently agree with Tim that she is quite beautiful. You then wonder what you look like and how well your new body compares to Tim's object of desire. Deciding to find out you look around for a mirror. Not finding one elsewhere in the class you remember that you now have a purse. Popping it open you find inside an iphone, stylish wallet, mascara stick, a small tube shaped package that you guess (cringing as you do) is a tampon and a little makeup compact. Turning away from Tim you pop open the compact and take a gander at your new face.

The first thing you realize, as you look at your new reflection, is how much you still look like you had before. Your skin was smoother and your nose and jawline a bit smoother but it was definitely still your face. Your long brown hair was done up in a short and quite stylish do and you decide that overall you were now a pretty good looking young woman. Replacing the compact you turn back to Tim and...
151121111222.title: Tim joins you as you make your way to class

choices: tell her she missed her chance. I want to go out with you now!
1511211112221.content:
"Tim," you say, "Would you say I am pretty?"

"Where the hell did that come from bro?" asked Tim, shocked.

"Just answer," you retort.

"Well, I suppose so," he replied, clearly uncomfortable about your question.

"Would you say I'm as pretty as Candy?" you prod.

"Hey man, where the hell are you going with this?" exclaims Tim, clearly worried about where the conversation seemed to be going.

"I mean, if you were any other guy, would you think I was as pretty as Candy?" you press.

"Well, yeah, I guess so," answers Tim uncomfortably, "Heck, I'd probably say you are even prettier than Candy then."

Strangely you feel happy about that last comment of Tim's.

"Well I'm always hanging out with you," you say to Tim, "So why do you think a girl as pretty as Candy wouldn't want to?"

Tim finally sees where you were going with your questions.

"Hey man! You're right! I don't know why I never thought about it like that before!" smiles Tim, "I'm perfectly comfortable around you so why the hell shouldn't I be fine with asking Candy just one little question?"

"Exactly!" you grin, knowing that had you still been a guy this argument would never have worked.

"Then that settles it," replies Tim proudly, "After class I'm going to go right over to Candy and..."
1511211112221.title: help him build the courage to ask Candy out

choices: read the journal of your new body
download some games to pass the time with
15112111122211.content: Deciding you'd done enough meddling with things for one class you spend the rest of it going through your phone's contacts and noticing that they were all identical to what you'd had in your old android phone. The rest of the apps though were quite different than what you had had before. There were a half dozen for various women's clothes store including one for a rather expensive and trendy lingerie store. Beyond those were various apps for tracking fashion magazines and even a few for keeping track of outfits. Finally you found an app labeled journal.
15112111122211.title: class continues

choices: the student lounge, you have a free hour

After a while the prof dismisses the class and Tim leaps to his feet to go talk with Candy. Smiling at how you'd helped your friend out you head off to...
151121111222112.title: download some games to pass the time with

choices: the guy you bumped into earlier
Susanne, busy working on her laptop
1511211112221122.content: When you get to the student lounge you see...
1511211112221122.title: the student lounge, you have a free hour

choices: Tim shows up, after successfully asking out Candy Bean
15112111122211221.content:
As you set foot inside the student lounge you spot the guy you had bumped into earlier and he also spots you. You take a step back, not sure you wanted to deal with the way he'd affected your body earlier and stumble in your heeled boots. Reaching out to grab hold of the wall, a hand catches yours and pulls you back to your feet. You turn to face the person who stopped you from falling and see that it is Mike, the guy you wanted to avoid.

"You really got to be more careful!" joked Mike.

"Uh, yeah," you reply, looking away from him nervously.

"I believe you said your name was Harriet? Am I right?" he asked, finally releasing your hand.

You look back up at him and nod your head nervously.

"So I was just wondering Harriet," began the guy, "If you'd at all be interested in going out to lunch with me sometime?"

You were stupefied. Not even half a day of being a girl and a guy you'd never met before is asking you out. Looking around wildly you wonder what to say.

"I'm sorry, I can't..." you begin. Suddenly,
15112111122211221.title: the guy you bumped into earlier

151121111222112211.content:
"Hey Harriet!" grins Susanne, "Who is this?"

"I'm Mike," was Mike's quick reply.

Susanne's arrival and the way she was hugging you and resting her head on your shoulder made you think of an easy way out of your little crisis. "So Mike, I'd like you to meet my girlfriend, Susanne!" you say, grinning at how your unchanged relationship with Susanne was able to save you from an uncomfortable situation. "We're dating!" you add just to make sure Mike understood what you were getting at.

"Oh, well..." replied Mike, obviously let down, "I guess then it I'll see you around!" Mike then slumped off out of sight.

"What was that all about?" asked Susanne inquisitively.
151121111222112211.title: Susanne arrives

choices: Susanne leaves now for another class, you still have break
Susanne offers to take you out for a quick snack before your next class
1511211112221122111.content:
"Oh, well he just asked me out," you reply calmly now that the situation had defused some.

"And my loyal little Harriet wouldn't have nothing of it!" smile Susanne, kissing you on the cheek. "I'm so lucky I would up with a girl like you!" she added.
1511211112221122111.title: tell her the truth

choices: try to learn more about what parts of your life have changed
try to learn more about how your body has changed
15112111122211221111.content:
"Well, I gotta go again!" smiles Susanne, "See you at lunch!" With that she ran off for her second class of the day.

Since you still have an hour of free time, what do you go and do?
15112111122211221111.title: Susanne leaves now for another class, you still...

choices: Tim shows up, triumphant in his mission to ask out Candy Bean
151121111222112211111.content: Going over to one of the available computers you sit down and are about to log in when...
151121111222112211111.title: Trying to learn about life changes...

choices: Return to your goal of learning about your new life
go find someplace to be alone
1511211112221122111111.content:
"Harriet!" exclaims Tim, taking a seat next to you, "I did it!"

"She say yes?" you ask, guessing by his attitude that she had.

"Hell yeah!" he grinned back, "I'm gonna go celebrate some by playing a few rounds of TF2 with some of the other guys!"

"Why didn't you say so?" you say back to him, "I'd love to play some TF2"

"Don't be silly Harriet! You always tell me how you can't stand video games!" laughed Tim. "Besides, you are why I had the courage to ask Candy out! So here, take this and go buy yourself a nice pair of sunglasses or something!" he says, handing you a twenty, "Or however a trendy girl like you celebrates!"

"Uh, thanks," you say back to Tim, not sure you like the way your new body's interests seem to be keeping you from playing one of your favourite games with your best friend.

"Well, talk to you later then! I'll talk to you later!" and with that Tim was off to play TF2 with some of your other classmates and friends.
1511211112221122111111.title: Tim shows up, triumphant

choices: figure out what had changed and what had stayed the same
Think about what kind of a person the world now expected you to be
15112111122211221111112.content:
Suddenly wanting to be alone you know just where to go. Walking across campus and to the top of one of the stairs in the law building you come to one of your favourite places to go and think. There at the top of the stairwell there was a little have cylinder window looking out across the campus. And along one wall there was a small wooden stool. Despite the great view you'd never seen anyone else up here and so it had become your favourite place to go to when you just wanted some time to sit and think.

Pulling the stool out to a spot closer to the window you take a seat and gaze out at the University campus. As you sit there and relax you begin to think about your experiences so far that day.
15112111122211221111112.title: go find someplace to be alone

choices: decide to try and adapt to the world's expectations of your interests
decide to make the world adjust to your true interests
151121111222112211111122.content:
As you sit and gaze out at the wonderful view of campus your mind wanders to thinking about the way the rest of the world now seems to treat you and what it expects you to act like.

"Though my relationships with everyone seem to all be the same, everyone seems to think I'm some sort of a fashion genius and that I'm not at all interested in things like video games," you whisper to the curved glass.

Since you really didn't know much about fashion in general, never mind women's fashion, you didn't know how well you were going to be able to live up to the world's expectations of your interests.

"What the hell am I supposed to do for fun?" you murmur desperately.
151121111222112211111122.title: Think about what kind of a person you are now...

choices: Skip to lunch time with Susanne
You arrive at the computer lab
1511211112221122111111221.content:
Deciding that you might be best to adapt to everyone else's apparent expectations of your interests you set out for a nearby computer lab.

"If I'm going to become the fashionista the world thinks I am, I'm gonna have to do a bit of research first!" you say proudly to yourself, finally deciding that hearing a womans voice when you spoke was not as bad as you may have originally thought.
1511211112221122111111221.title: Learning your new interests

choices: the lab you and Tim usually played TF2 in
a campus clothing store to buy something more your 'style'
1511211112221122111111222.content: Pocketing the twenty Tim gave you, you go to the locker you rented and open it up. Slightly unsurprisingly you fail to find your old laptop in it. Deciding that you can figure out your computer situation later you go to...
1511211112221122111111222.title: Keeping your old interests

15112111122211221111112222.content:
As you click down the aisles of the campus clothing store you wonder what size your new body is. After a bit of searching you guesstimate that you wear about the same sized clothes as you had before (somewhat smaller and naturally cut for women but close enough to eyeball it). Grabbing a black tshirt sporting the school logo and a pair of khakis you go to a change room.

In the change room you take one last look at your reflection dressed in the trendy clothes your body's past interest had bought before stripping them off down to the skimpy bra and matching thong. Finally having a full (mostly) view of your new body you agree with your earlier decision that you were a really good looking girl. You could still see the resemblance to your old male body but it was more like you were the twin sister of your old body than anything else.

"Damn!" you twang at your reflection, impressed at how good looking of a girl you had somehow become.

You then pull on the new tshirt and pants, confirming that they fit. After redressing in your new body's old life's trendy clothes you go out and buy the tshirt and pants, as well as a pair of sneakers and a hoodie. Popping into a bathroom on your way to the lab where you and Tim used to play TF2 you swap back out of the newsprint styled tshirt, stylish belt and tight designer jeans with knee high heeled boots. Putting on the slightly looser school tshirt and comfortable khakis you slip your feet into the sneakers and pop the hoody on over your breasts. After tossing the other clothes into the bag your new ones came in you head out of the bathroom and off to...

"What?" you ask back.

"Get down here! They're about to start!" replies the voice.

"Where?"

"The student's fashion show auditions of course!" exclaimed the voice before hanging up.

Not sure what to do with the information you had just gotten you...

As the bus lurches to a stop at a traffic light you don't know what to do. The gentleman is smiling at you kindly and is obviously ready to ride standing up though by his age and how much he had struggled to stand up you aren't sure if you'd be politer to let him stay seated.
15112112.title: Chivalry is dead? Perhaps not...

1511312.content:
Suddenly a beam of light shot out of your eyes and hit the flight attendant square in the back. Suddenly you found yourself to be much more tired and you seemed to be propped up against some sort of suitcase. Through the haze of your tiredness you see your dad pull up in his car. Too far tired to wonder why he arrived you let him take you and your suitcase back home. All the way there he muttered about how you had made it that far on the bus that you should have been able to take the one last bus ride home. He then dropped you off at home and sped off again, now muttering about being late for work.

Feeling so tired that you did not notice your new female body you...

Collapsing onto the couch you flip on the TV. Struggling to keep your eyes open you half consciously wonder why your chest seemed extra sensitive. As the first commercial break begins you fade off into a fitful sleep.

When you wake up it is because...
15113121.title: crash on the couch while trying to watch TV

choices: you ask Anna & Emma what they were talking about
151131211.content:
Still a bit groggy you are awoken by the sound of your twin sisters coming in through the front door busily chatting away. Prying open your eyes you look over at them and see them turn the corner into the living room. They then let out an ear piercing shriek of joy before running over to you. Sitting up you take note of how your chest seems heavier than it used to but decide the feeling must just be a left over bit of grogginess.

"You're back!" cries out Anna.

"How was work?" queries Emma.

"Did you see any hot guys?" prods Anna.

"How long until you go back to work?" asks Emma.

"I missed you!" they both shouted out at once.

You just sat there in shock, wondering what the heck they were talking about. The two of them often didn't seem to make any sense but this was far stranger than anything you'd seen or heard before from them.

"Just... Just..." you mutter back to them, trying to finish waking up and wondering why your voice sounded so strange and feminine.

Anna and Emma just kept right on sitting there waiting for you to answer their queries. You blinked your eyes over and over again, trying to finish off the last shreds of sleepiness, bothered that the swollen feeling from your chest wasn't going away.

Finally, after a few more minutes...
151131211.title: Your twin sisters just got home from school

15122.content:
Just as you were perusing the bus stop. The bitchy teen screamed out and flailed her arms, catching your attention.

At that moment, there was a bright light, forcing you to look away and cover your eyes. Causing you to wonder, where there was a light bright enough to cause that type of glare off her wrist watch. As you turned your attention back you realized something was different.

The flash of light had not been from her watch at all but was in fact you swapping something with her. Apparently, the movement of her arms combined with her scream and averted your attention to her caused a swap.

What to you swap?
15122.title: the bitchy teen

choices: Suzanne meets you at your stop. She's your caretaker now
You skipped grades and are still in college
1512212.content:
Looking back after the flash, you were surprised to see the bitchy girl gone. Scanning the bus you were confused as you now saw a snobby woman trying to con the bus driver on. Just like the girl who'd been there a moment before, she was dressed in clothes betraying the fact that she probably wouldn't have any trouble paying the toll.

As you watched, she tried emphasizing her ample cleavage to convince the driver into letting her on. Without giving it conscious thought, you reached up to adjust your backpack strap.....

Wait why am I wearing a backpack strap? You thought. Examining your attire, you see that your clothes have changed to reflect more current fashion trends. Your shoes are brightly colored, your jeans have been replaced with skinny jeans, and your t-shirt now bears the logo of some pop band.

Looking at your physique you're dumbfounded to see almost no muscle tone and minimal body hair.
Only then does it dawn on you that the sexed up woman trying to get on the bus is actually he bitchy teen and that you've swapped ages. This depresses you since it was apparent that you now would be reliant on others to get around and, worst of all, you might have to go back to school!

Does this mean Sue and I are no longer dating? What's the nature of our relationship now? You wonder.
1512212.title: Age

choices: Suzanne, the zookeeper or the single mother (or one of her kids)
The highschool girl working the icecream stand or one of the middle school kids
152.content:
You were having a nice saturday morning with Suzanne at the zoo despite the fact that she kept wandering off to talk to zoo keepers and vendors. It was on one such occasion that you decided to take a seat on one of the zoo's benches. Looking across at Susanne as she spoke with a 20-something male zookeeper you smile, enjoying yourself.

As their discussion starts to take a while your eyes begin to wander. Over by the flamingo enclosure you see a pretty young single mom who is trying to keep track of her triplets as they scream and run around in excitement. Next you notice a highschool aged girl happily working at the ice cream concession stand. When Susanne had spoken with her earlier she seemed to be so happy with her job and from what you had overheard, she obviously wanted to go to university to become a teacher because she liked working with kids so much. The next person to catch your eye was a middle school couple who were making out on a bench near the peacock exhibit. You smiled thinking how nice it would be to have had someone to share such passion for at their age.

As you continue to survey the scene before you, your power activates and you fire a beam at...
152.title: At the zoo with Suzanne

choices: The single mom or one of her kids
1521.content: Who do you swap a life aspect with?
1521.title: Suzanne, the zookeeper or the single mother

15213.content: The mother or one of her triplet kids?
15213.title: The single mom or one of her kids

152131.content: What do you swap with the single mother?
152131.title: Mother of triplets

choices: Buy the kids some ice cream (just go with it)
1521312.content:
You looked back over at the single mother and see that she seems to be taking a break from trying to corral her three energetic triplets. As she relaxed on a bench the beam goes off and you feel a jolt. Suddenly you find yourself sitting much closer to the animal enclosures. Looking around you wonder what happened. Deciding that whatever it was, it must not have been all that important you lean your head back and let out a nice long sigh. Yes you let out a nice long, feminine???? sounding sigh?

Snapping your head back up you peer down a slender nose at your body only to be confronted by the body of a fit young woman dressed in a Tshirt and jeans styled very similar to the ones you had been wearing before though now being worn and obviously made for a more feminine body. As though that wasn't enough the three triplets you had seen earlier run over and stand in front of you. One of them then asks, "Can we have some ice cream mommy?"
1521312.title: relationships and gender

152132.content: What do you swap with one of the triplets?

15223.title: The guy of the middleschool couple

choices: Shrug an go back to making out with the middle school girl
Excuse yourself from the make-out session and try to figure out what's going on
152231.content:
All of a sudden you find yourself making out with someone. You stop for a moment to look at who your making out with and see the middle school girl. "What's wrong Harvey?" The girl asked.

Then you notice a man that looked like the boy that the girl was making of with, standing where you had been. You pull out your wallet and notice that your state ID says you are thirteen.
152231.title: Making out with a pretty middle school girl

info.brief_description: You gain the ability to swap some life attributes with someone else once a week.
info.description:
Harvey Bolt is 21 years old. He attends University in his home town and works part time in a research lab on campus. He is a bit of a science nerd and enjoys learning new things and trying out new experiences. He has a girlfriend, Susanne Lockridge [21], who attends the same University and who works part time as a junior columnist for the City's newspaper. Harvey also has a pair of twin sisters, 18, who do everything together and are both on their high school's swim team. Harvey's Mother (Adrianna) left his Father (Thomas) just six months earlier only to elope with Harvey's Best friend's (Tim Yu [22]) Father (Paul). Since then Tim and his three younger sisters (Kaisha [11], Ani [17] & Lily [20]) have been living with Harvey's family while Tim's mother (Kai) is in prison for assaulting her now ex-husband days before Adrianna Bolt and Paul Yu eloped.

One day Harvey is working at his job when he is struck by a blast from an experimental laser. This blast imbues Harvey with the power to, once a week, swap gender (name too), age, work & school, relationships (family & friends, etc.), or hobbies (any permutation thereof) with someone else by shooting them with a beam of light. Only Harvey is aware of the change. For everyone else, reality adjusts to make them think everything is normal.

Basic Rules:
1. No personality changes for Harvey.
2. When Harvey swaps gender with a woman, he turns into a female version of himself.
3. Only 1 swap event per week (7 days).

NOTE:
I reserve the right to delete or modify chapters that do not follow these above three rules. This does not mean I will but it does mean I might.
